headline: Datadog, Inc. (DDOG): A Bear Case Theory
summary: We came across a bearish thesis on Datadog, Inc. (DDOG) on Substack by Elliot. In this article, we will summarize the bears’ thesis on DDOG. Datadog, Inc. (DDOG)’s share was trading at $151.96 as of Nov 27th. DDOG’s trailing and forward P/E were 276.29 and 73.53 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Datadog has emerged as a key […]
